name: Corrupted (itch) (AvatarYoshi)
description:
Corrupted is a side scrolling three person co-op dungeon crawler. The game explores the story of four high school students playing a Tabletop RPG game and the crazy fun and terror they get into in a beat-em-up style representation. Will you be able to help them find the corrupted Dreadknight at the end of the dungeon?

Team members:

Hiroshi Estrada - Producer, Designer
Matt Robertson - Writer, Designer
Alex Bagg - Programmer
Jonathan Saavedra - Programmer
Noel Biscocho - Programmer
Akihiro Izumi - Programmer
